start.text: Well now, what have we here? A new face in this dusty old town. You look like you've got some coin on you.

choices.text: I'd sooner die than give you a single coin.
Perhaps we can come to an... arrangement.

neutral_response.text: A weary traveler with some heavy pockets, I'd wager. Don't cause trouble, and maybe you'll keep 'em.

hostile_response.text: Is that so? Well, I'm happy to oblige. Draw!

positive_response.text: Ha! I like your style. What kind of arrangement are we talkin' about?

choices.text: I've got a proposition for you.
